system.requirements:
Tier 2; Weapon Skill 40, Survival +10 
Aptitudes: Fieldcraft, Weapon Skill
system.effect:
When the character makes a melee attack as part of a Charge Action or Crushing Charge Mounted Special Action, their attack gains Felling(Weapon Skill Bonus/2), rounded up.
Additionally, when character makes a melee attack as part of a Crushing Charge Mounted Special Action, they deal additional damage equal to the Mount's Strength Bonus.
